                     <namePart>Bennett College (Greensboro, N.C.)</namePart>

                     <namePart>Institute for Education by Radio.</namePart>
                     <role>
                        <roleTerm valueURI="http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators/cre">Creator</roleTerm>
                     </role>
                  </name>
                  <titleInfo>
                     <title>Records, 1924-1972.</title>
                  </titleInfo>
                  <abstract>Consists of board of directors' files, annual reports, minutes, financial files, correspondence, memoranda, printed items and clippings. Included are the files of C.K. Ogden and the Orthological Institute; records of the National Committee for the Study of Social Values in Motion Pictures and of the Motion Picture Research Council; fellowships and grants files; Negro projects-race relation files; radio project files, including the records of the National Committee on Education By Radio, the Ohio State University Bureau of Educational Research, the Ohio School of the Air and National Association of Educational Broadcasters printed materials; files of the Junior Extension University, Inc. and various subject and organizational files relating to youth programs, character development, and educational broadcasting. </abstract>
                  <name>
                     <namePart>Rhinelander District Library</namePart>
                     <role>
                        <roleTerm valueURI="http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators/rps">Repository</roleTerm>
                     </role>
                  </name>
               </mods>
            </objectXMLWrap>
resource.title: Records, 1924-1972.
resource.abstract: Consists of board of directors' files, annual reports, minutes, financial files, correspondence, memoranda, printed items and clippings. Included are the files of C.K. Ogden and the Orthological Institute; records of the National Committee for the Study of Social Values in Motion Pictures and of the Motion Picture Research Council; fellowships and grants files; Negro projects-race relation files; radio project files, including the records of the National Committee on Education By Radio, the Ohio State University Bureau of Educational Research, the Ohio School of the Air and National Association of Educational Broadcasters printed materials; files of the Junior Extension University, Inc. and various subject and organizational files relating to youth programs, character development, and educational broadcasting.

resource.source:
<objectXMLWrap>
               <did xmlns="urn:isbn:1-931666-22-9">
                  <unittitle>Helen Powell Smith papers, 
		  <unitdate>1941-1995.</unitdate>
                  </unittitle>
                  <unitid>23-1-2799</unitid>
                  <origination>
                     <persname>Helen Powell. Smith </persname>
                  </origination>
                  <physdesc>12 pages.</physdesc>
                  <physdesc>Packet.</physdesc>
                  <repository>Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library</repository>
                  <abstract>Photocopies and memorabilia reflecting on Smith's career in radio ("Let's Make a Dress") and acknowledgement by the Institute for Education by Radio.</abstract>
                  <langmaterial>Collection material in <language>English</language>
                  </langmaterial>
               </did>
            </objectXMLWrap>
resource.title: Helen Powell Smith papers, 1941-1995.
resource.abstract: Photocopies and memorabilia reflecting on Smith's career in radio ("Let's Make a Dress") and acknowledgement by the Institute for Education by Radio.
